title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for the Thames Valley
purpose: To advance the Thames Valley’s global reputation as a business location of choice and an engine of growth for the United Kingdom. The ambition is to shape local and national growth plans that can secure the thriving, green, healthier future we want for a truly competitive Thames Valley.

contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Paul Britton, Thames Valley Chamber of Commerce and Industry. Tel: 01753 870500
contact_details.secretariat: Thames Valley Chamber of Commerce and Industry acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.thamesvalleychamber.co.uk/

detailed_benefits.Source: Thames Valley Chamber of Commerce and Industry
detailed_benefits.Description: Thames Valley Chamber of Commerce and Industry is paid by the following to act as the group's secretariat: Heathrow, Honda Motor Europe, University of the Built Environment, University of Reading From: 21/07/2025 To: 20/07/2026
